ca.mcgill.ecse211.project

Class UltrasonicLocalize

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.UltrasonicLocalize
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class UltrasonicLocalize
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class is used to localize the robot using the Ultrasonic Sensor at the beginning of the competition.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Executes the ultrasonic localization, situating the robot towards a predefined 0 degrees direction, and moving the robot towards the predefined origin point.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • goToOrigin

        public static void goToOrigin()
        Once localized to 0 degrees, this function will move the robot to the origin.

      • getUSdistance

        public static double getUSdistance()
        Gets the most recent reading from the ultrasonic sensor.
        Returns:
        Ultrasonic sensor reading in cm

      • turnBy

        public static void turnBy(double angle)
        Turns the robot by a specified angle. Note that this method is different from Navigation.turnTo(). For example, if the robot is facing 90 degrees, calling turnBy(90) will make the robot turn to 180 degrees, but calling Navigation.turnTo(90) should do nothing (since the robot is already at 90 degrees).
        Parameters:
        angle - the angle by which to turn, in degrees

      • convertDistance

        public static int convertDistance(double distance)
        Converts input distance to the total rotation of each wheel needed to cover that distance.
        Parameters:
        distance - the input distance
        Returns:
        the wheel rotations necessary to cover the distance

      • convertAngle

        public static int convertAngle(double angle)
        Converts input angle to the total rotation of each wheel needed to rotate the robot by that angle.
        Parameters:
        angle - the input angle
        Returns:
        the wheel rotations necessary to rotate the robot by the angle

      • stopMotors

        public static void stopMotors()
        Stops both motors.

        public static void setSpeed(int speed)
        Sets the speed of both motors to the same values.

        public static void setSpeeds(int leftSpeed,

        Sets the speed of both motors to different values.

      • avgReading

        public static double avgReading()
        Gets 10 readings from the ultrasonic sensor then returns the average.
